resources.string: Provide your user details for the MyEpisodes.com website below.
Username or password incorrect, please try again!
Register here, fill in all your user details and click on register.
Username already exists, please choose another username.

Written by: Dirk Vranckaert
 Maintained by:
 * Dirk Vranckaert
 * Ivo Janssen
 Translations by:
 * Dirk Vranckaert (English, Dutch)
 * Fredrik Nohrborg (Swedish)
 * Daniel De Luca (French, Italian)
 * Hyeon Tae Jeon (Korean)
 * Sergio Travieso (Spanish)
 License: GNU GPL V3 License
 Project website: http://code.google.com/p/my-episodes-watch-manager
 Project contact: dirkvranckaert@gmail.com
 
 Mange the episodes you follow using MyEpisodes.com (registration required) and watch directly on your mobile what's the next episode you have to watch.
Your credentials will no longer be stored on the device.
Because settings are changed, the episodes will be refreshed now!
All fields should be filled in!
Something went wrong. Try to restart the application and check your internet connection. If you keep having this issue report a bug at http://code.google.com/p/my-episodes-watch-manager/.
Could not establish internet connection. Please try again!
Could not establish internet connection. Use the menu option to reload and try again.
Network error!\nCheck you network settings and try refreshing manually.
Failed to mark this episode watched!\nCheck internet connection or refresh the list!

Version 1.6.1
 ***********
 New application logo
 Change default language in settings
 Supporting most custom date settings from myEpisodes.com config screen
 Airdates now shown in the format of your language
 Some code-optimalizations
 No reload of data required when changing orientation
 Application translated into Spanish
 
 Version 1.6.0
 ***********
 Full MyEpisodes.com mobile application including episodes to watch, episodes to aqcuire and upcoming episodes
 Fixed bug that some episodes where not listed
 Fixed bug for large collections issue in episodes lists
 Fixed bug in episodes with special characters
 Version 1.5.1
 ***********
 Better Google Analytics statistics
 
 Version 1.5.0
 ***********
 Android 2.2 aka Froyo compatible
 Preferences screen
 Remember password preference
 Sort shows preference
 Sort episodes preference
 Better context menu
 Bug in showing episode title in list solved
 Login bug solved
 French translations by Daniel De Luca
 Italian translations by Daniel De Luca
 Korean translations by Hyeon Tae Jeon
 
 Version 1.4.1
 ***********
 Swedish translation by Fredrik Nohrborg
 
 Version 1.4.0
 ***********
 Grouping of episodes
 
 Version 1.3.5
 ***********
 Update login screen and procedure
 Layout modifications (header)
 Bugs in white theme solved
 
 Version 1.3.4
 ***********
 Implemented white theme suggested by Ivo Janssen
 
 Version 1.3.3
 ***********
 Implemented Question dialog when logging out
 
 Version 1.3.2
 ***********
 Added Google Analytics for statics
 Solved issue with to long episode names
 
 Version 1.3.1
 ***********
 Added about dialog
 Added changelog dialog
 Tested compatibility with Android 2.0
 Internationalization (i18n: English, Dutch)
 
 Version 1.3.0
 ***********
 Bugfixing release
 
 Version 1.2.0
 ***********
 Network connction issues solved
 Date formatting in episode details
